properties.name: Austin
properties.notes: Northeast corner of Burnet Rd and US 183.

properties.name: Bangalore
properties.notes: We're at a different location in Indiranagar this month - Bohemians on 12th Main, Indiranagar! Register at - https://insider.in/event/puzzled-pint-bangalore-september-2023/buy/shows/64fd68c58155390008a35ee0/Tickets

properties.name: Bay Area - East Bay
properties.notes: The food truck at the venue for the night of Puzzled Pint will be Mezcla Columbian Eats.

properties.name: Bay Area - San Francisco
properties.notes:
San Francisco game control volunteers will be hosting Puzzled Pint at two San Francisco locations again this month from 6pm to 9pm. Come puzzle with us at either venue.

The Napper Tandy at 3200 24th Street in the Mission District

Enjoy Irish pub food, drinks, and ambiance along with your puzzles at The Napper Tandy. Ample outdoor and indoor seating options. Look for game control by the door to pick up a puzzle set.

OR

Willkommen at 2198 Market Street in Castro/Hayes Valley

Solve your puzzles with us over craft beers and German-American food at the Willkommen beer hall. Features both indoor and outdoor seating, though the outdoor table surface may be somewhat less conducive to puzzling. Consider bringing a good writing surface if you prefer the outdoor option; we'll try to have some on hand to loan. Note that this location closes at 9pm.

properties.name: Boston
properties.notes: Please collapse our attendance wave function by RSVPing at https://pp-rsvp.com/RWGFU4 (preferably by Monday evening) so we know how many sets to print.

properties.name: Boulder
properties.notes:
PLEASE NOTE: There are multiple Murphy's in Boulder County - we're meeting at the one in Louisville!

Just talk to the host stand for a table, and come pick up puzzles from us at the host table.

properties.name: Brno
properties.notes: Write to Lipča (lipcaaa@gmail.com) if you plan to come. Do *NOT* write to Yeti this time – he's travelling.

properties.name: Charlottesville
properties.bar: Brazos Tacos @ Barracks Road Shopping Center
properties.notes:
Brazos Tacos @ Barracks Road Shopping Center!

Note that this is the NEW Brazos Tacos location (where the old Brixx Pizza used to be in the Barracks Road Shopping Center), NOT the Brazos location at the Ix Art Park!

They have nice indoor and outdoor seating (including covered outdoor seating even if the weather isn't perfect). Tacos and alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks are available.

Please RSVP to puzzledpintcho@gmail.com if you will definitely or probably attend!

properties.name: Chicago - City North
properties.address: 3403 N Damen Ave, City North, IL 60657
properties.notes: Please RSVP at https://pp-rsvp.com/6PKZEW so we know how many to print! Looking forward to another fun month of puzzles!

properties.name: Chicago - City South
properties.notes: RSVP here for Marz: https://buytickets.at/puzzledpintchicago/998037

properties.name: Christchurch
properties.notes: Join us at one of Christchurch's newest venues, and ONLY ESports bar! Please email us (not the venue) to book your table this month (email: talktolisaholmes@gmail.com) We need to have numbers through to the venue by Monday afternoon so if you are reading this after 4 on Monday, please contact the venue directly to book.

properties.name: Columbia, Maryland
properties.notes: Looking forward to seeing you all! Put on your thinking caps, no special supplies needed this month!

properties.name: Denver
properties.notes: Please RSVP by emailing denverpuzzledpint@gmail.com. This helps us get an accurate headcount for printing and for the venue. See you there!

properties.name: Edinburgh
properties.notes: As always, please have someone from your group RSVP to PuzzPintEdi@protonmail.com so we can print enough puzzle sets and give the pub an approximate idea of numbers.

properties.name: Galway City
properties.address: 3 William Street west, Galway City, G H91V184

properties.name: Huntsville
properties.notes:
We will be set up inside the main area. Looking forward to seeing everyone there!

They do sell pizza! I recommend ordering early if you are wanting food.

For more info, visit us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PuzzPintHSV.

properties.name: Jersey City/Hoboken
properties.notes: Hi - this month, we will not be having an in-person event as unfortunately our organizer team will be otherwise preoccupied. Please reach out to @puzzledpinthudsoncounty on Tuesday for puzzles, or check out this page once they get posted online!

properties.name: Kansas City
properties.notes: We are going to hold off one more month and come back for spooky season in Ocotober. Sorry, promise we are back next month! If anyone wants the puzzles for Tuesday private message your email address to our Facebook page and we can send them to you.

properties.name: Kitchener-Waterloo
properties.notes: RSVP to travisandhanna@gmail.com by Monday night so we can give an update to the bar and know how many sets to print! Games on Tap will be opening specifically for Puzzled Pint and will be there by around 5PM.

properties.name: Leeds
properties.notes:
Puzzled Pint is back in person in Leeds again! Come and join us at The White Swan, next door to City Varieties from 7pm.

Be prepared to have your mind split in two - there's more than one way to solve these problems!

properties.name: London
properties.notes:
At the moment Puzzled Pint London is still running remotely. You're encouraged to join your friends in a video call and solve Puzzled Pint together.

We'll be running the event through our online tool at https://puzzledpint.live/.

You can download the puzzles and check your answers from 7pm on Tuesday

GC will be available to help on request too

properties.name: Los Angeles - Inland Empire
properties.notes: Let me know by email or Facebook if you're planning to come!

properties.name: Los Angeles - Northeast
properties.notes: Plenty of parking in the lot. Look for Jake and Steph to get your puzzle pack :) Don't forget a pencil!

properties.name: Los Angeles - Santa Monica
properties.notes:
Come join us for puzzles and pints at O'Brien's! They've got trivia at 8 so you can make it a brain games double-header if you want, but don't worry - we'll be on the patio isolated from all that if trivia isn't your thing. This is a great set, don't miss it!

In addition to beer, O'Brien's has a good menu, so bring your appetite. We'll see you there!

properties.name: Madison
properties.notes:
********************** IMPORTANT INFO! **********************
We're excited to bring Puzzled Pint to Delta Beer Lab, our first experiment at a brewery with very limited food options. You are welcome to bring your own food in, or you can avail yourself of Delta's giant soft pretzels, popcorn, and grocery style pizzas from Pep's Drafthaus and Salvatore's Tomato Pies (you cook and prepare them at their pizza station) -- see more details here. 🥨🍿🍕 We'll be there shortly before 6pm as usual and they'll stay open for us until 9pm.
*****************************************************************

RSVPs are optional but appreciated: if you RSVP for your team at gc.madisonpuzzles.com by Tuesday morning, we will be sure to set aside a puzzle set for you. (We will also bring extra sets, so please come even if you haven't RSVP'd!)

properties.name: Manchester
properties.notes:
It's time for a new venue... the Metropolitan, in Didsbury! A big pub situated right next to Burton Road tram stop, with onsite parking. We'll be in a section called the Library. See you there!

PUBLIC TRANSPORT: Take the Pink Line to Burton Road, or one of the following buses that stop right outside: 87, 111, 172. Buses 41, 43, 143 and 147 also stop close by on Palatine Road.

ACCESSIBILITY: There is a ramp next to some steps leading into the entrace, and a disabled toilet. For additional information ring 0161 445 3145.

IF IT'S YOUR FIRST TIME: Welcome!! Great to have you! When you come you should expect to solve four pen-and-paper puzzles over the course of a couple hours. Two volunteers will be acting as GC (Game Control) on the night (look out for their Puzzled Pint badges) and will be on hand to answer any questions. Once you're done hand in your answers to receive a meta-puzzle, and once you solve the meta-puzzle you've completed the set! Give or take a bonus puzzle, of course. GC will provide printouts and stationery so there's no need to bring anything except your wits. If you're bringing a team that's great, and if not we'll find you a team to join.

properties.name: Melbourne
properties.notes:
Please RSVP here so we know how many puzzles to print: https://pp-rsvp.com/QNQHJA

Note that there are three Taco Bill locations in the CBD - we are in the Bourke St one, close to Parliament Station

Please give us some feedback on our past venues, we'll put the favourites into higher rotation: https://forms.gle/JVYWBTDQZxtSpN5B8

Need help remembering Puzzled Pint each month? Click here to add a recurring event to your Google calendar

properties.name: Nashville

We are back in a bar. Come visit, and RSVP to be sure you get a puzzle set. RSVP at https://www.meetup.com/puzzlers-collective/events/295942381/

Look for the Puzzled Pint logo on the table near the door.

properties.name: New York City

properties.notes: Back at Beer Authority this month, hope to see you all there!

properties.name: Norwich
properties.notes: Call the pub on 01603 464461 if you want to book a table and message us either on Facebook or email to let us know you're coming. We'll need to know how many puzzles to print.

properties.name: Orange County
properties.address: 17877 Von Karman Ave Unit 110, Irvine, CA 92614
properties.notes:
This month we will meet at Hangar 24 brewing in Irvine at our earlier 6:00 pm time. Note that you will take a ticket when entering the parking lot, and the brewery will validate it. To get to the brewery, walk between buildlings A and B, and it will be on your left.

Please RSVP here:
https://pp-rsvp.com/P7EFAU

See you soon!

properties.name: Ottawa
properties.bar: The Royal Oak - Wellington at Hinton
properties.notes:
Please let us know you're coming by getting free tickets on eventbrite - it helps us know confirm our reservation numbers and how many puzzles to print.

Kevin and Steph

properties.name: Philadelphia
properties.notes: We will be on the 2nd floor, in the back area.  High ceilings and a nice open area!

properties.name: Phoenix
properties.address: 214 E Roosevelt St Suite 4, Phoenix, AZ 85004
properties.notes:
Phoenix Puzzlers!

Whether you are a regular or checking us out for the first time, please come and join other puzzlers for an evening of puzzlin' fun.

Look for Mark on the patio.

Bring a pencil or pen. We'll have other things like scissors, tape, etc., if you need them.

Bring friends!

(look for nearby parking on-line ... within a block or two there seem to be parking lots, and there is also metered street parking nearby)

properties.name: Pittsburgh
properties.notes: Join us at Federal Galley in the Northside! There are options for indoor and outdoor seating at this location. Nearby street parking is free after 6pm and there are bus routes nearby. Happy hour ends at 6:30 if you want a drink deal!

properties.name: Portland, Maine
properties.notes:
Cross your fingers for no rain! Google maps is a little off: this is the outdoor cafe in front of the Regency Hotel.

Rain plan is indoors at the Armory, there is a street entrance so you don't have to go through the hotel. But please look for me outside first!

Food is a little fancy but they have homemade ice cream sandwiches and a decent bar selection.

properties.name: Portland, Oregon
properties.address: 2705 NE Sandy Blvd, Portland, Oregon, OR 97232
properties.notes: Looks for us in the common area at the Zipper. (URL is for the bar, but we'll be in the main area.)

properties.name: Prague
properties.address: Letenské sady, Prague, Praha, Hlavní město 17000
properties.notes:
The pub does not accept payment cards.

There is limited lighting, so come early (you can come as early as 18.00) or take some light source.

Please fill the RSVP form at https://puzzledpint.sifrovacky.cz/praha.html

properties.name: Sacramento
properties.notes:
We're back at Kupros this month. You'll find us upstairs!

Plan to arrive before 6:30pm if you would like help finding a team.

Please RSVP on Meetup so we know how many puzzle sets to print. Join me at Puzzled Pint https://meetu.ps/e/Mr3z6/VtV2f/i

properties.name: Seattle - City

We're running two simultaneous events in Seattle! Please follow the Eventbrite link below to RSVP for the location you will attend:

properties.name: St. Louis
properties.notes: Come join us for a wonderful night of puzzling and guzzling (solving and sipping?) So we know how many copies to make, PLEASE RSVP to this FB event or email me at r_becker@sbcglobal.net subject line: Coming to Puzzled Pint. See you there!

properties.name: Stafford
properties.notes: UNfortunately, your Game Controllers will not be able to host this Tuesday but we will be back next month! The puzzles will be posted at puzzledpint.com on Wednesday ! Have fun!

properties.name: Sydney
properties.notes:
As you enter the venue walk straight ahead and down the stairs, we have reserved the whole room at the very back of the venue all for us!

Please bring your own stationery if possible, however we will have things to lend out!

Please like and share our facebook page and please leave us a review!

properties.name: Syracuse
properties.notes: Look for the Puzzled Pint table tent to pick up puzzles for your team - Game Control will be available with puzzles and hints from 6-9PM! I will plan to sit in the market near Juice + Flowers, but if that changes I will post an update.

properties.name: Tacoma
properties.notes: This restaurant is divided into an all-ages section on the ground floor and a 21+ bar upstairs. Depending on table availability, GCs may be sitting in the 21+ section. If that happens, we'll come down periodically to check for puzzlers sitting downstairs (or you can send up someone old enough to pick up your puzzles).

properties.name: Toronto
properties.notes:
Looking forward to seeing everyone this Tuesday, September 12, 2023.

We will be set up at our GC table to help with the puzzles from 6:00 - 9:00 PM

Please join us in the Discord between events for other puzzle-related fun!

Puzzled Pint Toronto is currently overseen by: Michaela and Stu at the GC table and Andria for venue booking and social media

properties.name: Tromsø
properties.notes: This month's installment will take place at the newly opened Brewyard Brewpub, outermost on Vervet (past the winebar and tapas restaurant). They have a good BBQ menu, so don't worry if you can't find time to eat before puzzling.

properties.name: Tulsa
properties.notes: We'll be at Cabin Boys Brewery on Utica in the Kendall Whittier district from 6:00-9:00. This location sells some snacks, but you can bring food with you if you'd like dinner while you solve. There is limited parking to the east of the building. Most of the parking is to the south, across the street. Family and dog friendly! This location does close at 9 on Tuesdays. We can't wait to see you there!

properties.name: Twin Cities
properties.notes:
We will be in the taproom at MetroNOME this month! Please refer to the brewery's website for food options -- they have a handful of food items on-site and are located near many restaurants.

The Saint Paul Conservatory of Music may be doing a free show on the same evening in a different part of the facility, which is a music venue as well as a brewery.

Here is some advice from the venue on parking and transit: we’re a couple blocks from the end of the LRT. There’s certainly street and lot parking around MetroNOME, and NO Saints game that night, so parking SHOULD be reasonable.

RSVP here by midnight on Monday so we can print a packet for you and prepare our hosts: https://pp-rsvp.com/KL297H 🧩🍺🎶✨

properties.name: Valencia
properties.address: Carrer del Dr. Ferran, 10, Valencia, V 46021
properties.notes:
Join the group on Telegram to stay up to date: https://t.me/puzzledpintvlc

Arrive by 2030 if you want to be placed in a team or arrive at any time before 2130 if you have your own team. We will be there until midnight. The puzzles usually take our teams around 2 hours to complete. Not a problem to come alone, you can complete the puzzles solo or we can help you find a team if you would like one. Ask for the Puzzled Pint and/or the Board Games group. We will occupy both 'sides' of the bar.

properties.name: Victoria
properties.notes:
The Moon Under Water loves us when can tell them a headcount, if possiblle, please RSVP per team to chris@enigmaticevents.com. Also please email us if you'd like to be on to our reminder email list.

We will have one side of the bar reserved for us until about 7.15. Look for the Yellow table sign for the puzzle packs!

properties.name: Washington - Arlington/City
properties.notes: Washington DC-City/Arlington will be back once again at Spider Kelly's in Clarendon. If you are planning to attend, please RSVP to puzzledpintdc@gmail.com so we know how many teams to expect and sets to print.

properties.name: Wellington
properties.notes:
This month we're over at Shed 22 (previously known as Macs Brew Bar) - we'll primarily be seted in the restaurant area to the left of the main entrance. Please RSVP here https://pp-rsvp.com/PNFJF5

No special stationery or quantum physics qualifications required :)

RSVP here (once per team): https://pp-rsvp.com/index.php?c=PNFJF5

properties.name: Zurich
properties.notes: This month we're at The Alehouse – Palmhof just up the road from ETH Zentrum (nearest tram stop is ETH/Universitätsspital or Haldenbach). Weather permitting you can find us on the terrace, if not then we'll be inside. See you there!
